newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy worried about Chechen crisis - ministry.
newsitem.headline: Italy worried about Chechen crisis - ministry.

text.p: Italy on Wednesday said it was deeply worried about the situation in breakaway Chechnya and urged dialogue between Russia and Chechen rebels to end the fighting.

"Italy is deeply convinced that there are no alternatives to dialogue and that only negotiations between the parties...can find an acceptable solution to the crisis in Chechnya," a foreign ministry said in a statement.
"The ministry hopes for the immediate and total cessation of fighting and official contacts for the establishment of a lasting ceasefire," it said.
